title: Fix robot animation lag and disable continuous rotation

requirements.summary: Optimize robot animation speed and responsiveness to eliminate lag during all gesture-triggered movements
acceptanceCriteria: All gesture-triggered animations execute immediately without noticeable delay
Animation transitions complete smoothly within 0.5-1 second
No frame drops or stuttering during animation playback
Robot responds to gesture changes in real-time

file_operations.description: Optimize animation performance by reducing animation duration values to 0.5-1 second range, increasing spring stiffness and damping coefficients for immediate response, and ensuring useFrame loop processes gesture state changes without delay. Review animation config objects for jump, rotate, raise hands, wave, move backward, clap, and move forward to ensure smooth real-time execution.

requirements.summary: Remove continuous autonomous rotation so robot only rotates when index+middle fingers gesture is actively detected
acceptanceCriteria: Robot remains stationary when no gesture is detected
Robot only rotates when index+middle fingers gesture is recognized
Rotation starts immediately upon gesture detection
Rotation stops when gesture is no longer detected or completes its animation cycle

file_operations.description: Remove any autonomous rotation logic from useFrame or animation loops that runs independently of gesture input. Ensure rotation animation is strictly triggered only when the 'peace' gesture (index+middle fingers up) is detected via the gesture prop, and stops when the gesture changes or animation completes. Verify that the robot mesh remains stationary when no gesture is active.
